Class FileSplitterByPartCount

java.lang.Object
actors.Action
actors.FileSplitterByPartCount
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileSplitter
public class FileSplitterByPartCount
extends Action
implements FileSplitter
A FileSplitter that splits Files by part count
